resources.string:
Galgotias University (sometimes known as Galgotia University) is a co–educational private university in Greater Noida (NCR) in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India.
 It was granted university status in 2011 by the Uttar Pradesh government.
Galgotias University has its main campus (Galgotias Education City) in Greater Noida near Jaypee Sports Complex (Buddh International Circuit) while the original campus called Galgotias Educational Institution Campus One is in Knowledge Park–II right beside Noida–Greater Noida Expressway.

Type:Private
Location:Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India
28.457543°N 77.497748°E
Website:www.galgotiasuniversity.edu.in
WebSIM Link:172.16.90.2/iSIM/login

Galgotias University and the Degrees awarded by the university are recognized by the UGC.

Approval by AICTE:


All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) is the statutory Body of the Government of India whose jurisdiction for granting approval is only for technical institutions which are affiliated to a University. Universities are out of its purview for grant of approval. As Galgotias University, Uttar Pradesh Act has been enacted by State Legislature, it is a legitimate University of this country established as per Section 2(f) of the UGC Act and, therefore, does not require AICTE approval. This standing of law is based on the judgment by hon’ble Supreme Court in the case of Bharathidasan University vs AICTE.

**Campuses**

Galgotias University has two campuses in Greater Noida.
 \:\:The old campus known as Galgotias Educational Institution Campus One in Knowledge Park phase–2 of Greater Noida.
 ::The new campus is 10 km from Campus One and is at the Yamuna Expressway on the outer of Greater Noida.

The Campus One mostly has the offices of Galgotias University and the three old colleges. The Boys hostel is at Campus One.

New Campus is well planned with many high–tech facilities that can't be provided on Campus One. The New Campus hosts most of the classes and serves as the education centre. The new campus is expected to have 18 blocks and is spread over 95 acres. A regular bus service operated by the university runs between the campuses.

**Central Library**

The Central Library consists of a number of departmental libraries which collectively support the teaching, research and extension programmes. All students, faculty members and employees are entitled to use the library facilities. Besides having a huge collection of books on engineering, science and bioinformatics, humanities and social sciences, and mass communication, it offers library services through its divisions. It uses a Libsys/SIM software package (an integrated multi–user library management system that supports all in–house operations). Libsys consists of modules on acquisition, cataloguing, circulation, serials, article indexing and OPAC.The Central Library has 9925 titles, 74585 volumes, 238 national journals, 165 international journals, 75 magazines, and 760 CDs. The library is in institutional membership with DELNET and American Central Library.

**Web SIM and FFCS**

Web SIM is a service offered to Galgotias University students that stores all student data from personal details to placement details, library information, assignments, holidays information, etc. Every student is given a username and password to access this data.

Galgotias University offers four types of subjects: University Core, University Elective, Programme Core and Programme Elective. The fully flexible credit–based system enables students to choose their elective subjects independently and provides flexibility to choose their hours of lectures. Students are supposed to complete the required number of credits by choosing the right programmes and attending the required number of lectures.
